dict.acceptation: 谁；什么人；关系代词，有先行词；孰；

sent.orig: The word "man" is the antecedent of "who" in "the man who spoke".
sent.trans: "man"这个字是"the man who spoke"中"who"的先行词。

sent.orig: The word 'who' in 'the man who came' is a relative pronoun.
sent.trans: 在themanwhocame这一片语中who这个词是关系代词。

sent.orig: WHO has also reviewed estimates of the incubation period of SARS, using individual case data.
sent.trans: WHO也用个体病例数据修订了对SARS潜伏期的估计。

sent.orig: Further information on the situation will be available on the WHO website on a regular basis.
sent.trans: 关于疾病情况的进一步信息将可以定期在WHO网站上得到。

sent.orig: WHO is assisting the Ministry of Health with laboratory diagnosis.
sent.trans: WHO协助该国卫生部门进行实验室诊断。
